text.0: vasu thou most youthful god bhārata agni bring us wealth.
text.2: let no malignity prevail against us either gods or mans.
text.3: save us from this and enmity.
text.4: so through thy favour may we force through all our enemies a way.
text.6: thou purifier agni high shinest forth bright adorable.
text.7: when worshipped with the sacred oil.
text.8: ours art thou agni bhārata honoured by us with barren cows.
text.9: with bullocks and with kine in calf.
text.10: woodfed bedewed with sacred oil ancient invoker excellent.
text.11: the son of strength the wonderful.
